item.title: Dev Env Setup
item.description: Unix Shell/Terminal/REPL/IDE zsh/oh-my-zsh https://ohmyz.sh/ iterm2 ipython/bpython jupyter notebook? PyCharm/VSCODE Python environment management Managing virtualenv â€” virtualenv/virtualenvwrapper or venv manages virtual environments for a specific Python version.
